content.header: Hi, thanks for checking out my website!
content: As stated on my home page, I'm a creative, detail-oriented professional with a unique blend of education and experience in data engineering, design, and music theory. I have experience transforming complex data into engaging, user-friendly data visualizations to improve user experiences and drive busineess insights.

My interdisciplinary background is valuable to me as a unique perspective in my projects. Looking back at my time as an undergraduate, I analyzed music notation and envisioned another method. Now I see thtis coming full circle in a data visualization career as my 'first' data vis project.
On a more formal note, find me on LinkedIn or Github:
